title: Mathematical Expression Evaluator
description:
EXEC calculates mathematic expressions and results a string.
The expression can only be a simple expression with an operator and wi￾thout brackets. For errors, such as a divide by zero EXEC provides the re￾turn string 'ERROR'.
The valid operators are: +, - *, /, ^, SIN, COS, TAN, SQRT.
REAL as numbers and integer numbers are allowed.
name: EXEC

input.name: str
input.description: The input string representing the mathematical expression to be evaluated.

output.name: EXEC
output.description: The result of the evaluated mathematical expression as a string.

return_value.description: The result or error message returned after evaluating the expression.
